metadata.name: Chloramphenicol Sodium Succinate 1 g 10mL Injection powder lyophilized for solution

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For the treatment of bronchial asthma keloid and hypertrophic scar and allergic disorders such as asthma allergic rhinitis and atopic dermatitis
